title: Danny Codling
text: Daniel Emile Codling (born 19 July 1979 in <a href="Auckland%2C%20New%20Zealand">Auckland, New Zealand</a>) is a former <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who won a bronze medal in the 64–69 kg (welterweight) division at the <a href="2002%20Commonwealth%20Games">2002 Commonwealth Games</a>.
